name: Margery  B. Howe
biography: Margery Howe was a neighbor of Margaret Whiting in Deerfield, Massachuetts.  Margaret Whitting was one of the founders of the Deerfield Society of Blue and White Needlework.  Margery Howe is also the author of "Deerfield Embroidery" (Charles Scribners: New York, 1976).
